item.title: assisted suicide advocate kevorkian "getting better"
item.description: assisted suicide advocate jack kevorkian, who helped more than 130 people end their lives before spending eight years in prison, was "getting better" and was "not in grave danger" at a detroit-area hospital on friday, his attorney said.

item.description: most of the sites that were brought down by the outage on thursday were back up on friday.

item.title: oil slips on inventory rise, supply threats support
